channel.description: Recent content in ereader on Blogging on Earth

item.title: Read New on new Reader
item.author: sunsp.gis@gmail.com (Shipeng Sun)
item.description: Acquired a new ebook reader Rakuten Kobo Elipsa. The device has a good size at 10 inch. It also supports Dropbox for loading books and OverDrive for borrowing from public libraries. A few useful settings: DoubleCommander: A open-source alternative to TotalCommander. A more powerful and more convenient file explorer. Briss: A open source PDF cropper. It is running on Java. Windows removes Java by default, but many programs, like ArcGIS Pro, installed their own Java Running Environment (JRE).
